prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a slender green alien man, mohawk white hair, pointed ears, divine shinjin robes, arrogant expression, gold earrings
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, subtle green skin texture, realistic fabric texture on robes, sharp focus on gold earrings
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, human skin color, flat lighting, low quality, blurry robes
